      Constructor and Description
      Pixel(int x, int y, Point a, Point b, int aaDepth)
      Creates a pixel object which holds the x and y of the display field, the rays that define the pixel in 3d space and the color is represents in a raster

    • Constructor Detail

      • Pixel

        public Pixel(int x,
     int y,
     Point a,
     Point b,
     int aaDepth)
        Creates a pixel object which holds the x and y of the display field, the rays that define the pixel in 3d space and the color is represents in a raster
        Parameters:
        x - the x corid int he display plane
        y - the y corid int he display plane
        a - The top left corner of the pixel's ray plane
        b - The bottom right corner of the pixel's ray plane
        aaDepth - The amount of anti aliasing the rays should calcualte.
